1100111011000011 1010101110010110 1 -> sum: 0111101001011010, cout: 1
0011000001111001 1111000100011100 0 -> sum: 0010000110010101, cout: 1
0110111001110011 1101100011011110 0 -> sum: 0100011101010001, cout: 1
0010100000001010 0100010100101010 0 -> sum: 0110110100110100, cout: 0
0001000011001101 1010110100011100 0 -> sum: 1011110111101001, cout: 0
0010100100100100 0000101001010111 0 -> sum: 0011001101111011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
